column1: good length ball, just outside off and moves away, lets it go through to keeper
on middle and leg stump, worked away to backward square leg for a single
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, lets it go through to keeper
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to point for a quick single
back of length, on off stump, stands tall and punches to cover
Top shot! Full ball, on off stump, just a push down the ground with superb timing and it races away to mid-off fence for four
Another fantstic shot! This time short in length, leans back and cuts it away to deep point fence for four more
Poor delivery, this time goes way down the leg side even diving Rizwan fails to collect that one, goes for five wides
good length ball, on off stump and swings in a bit, taps it to off side for a quick single
What a classic touch! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, whips it away with his wrists and it races away to deep midwicket fence for four
on middle and leg stump, turned away to deep square leg
good length ball, on target, turned away to short midwicket
good length ball, on off stump, defends to leg side, Chibhabha goes far down the wicket to take a sigle, sent back by Taylor, Hasnain runs across but fails to pick up the ball, no damage done
another run out chance is missed. Good length ball, on target, inside edge onto pad an goes for a quick single, Hasnain picks up in his follow throw and once again fails to hit the stumps
good length ball, on off stump, defended to cover
short in length, outside off, cuts it down to third man for a single
Back of length, on off stump, stands tall and defends to off side
good length ball, on target, gets well forward and defends it to off side
arm ball, came down the wicket and tried to defend, took it on the pad
once again throw missed the stumps. Tossed up, on off stump, pushed to mid-off, ran a quick single and fielder once again missed the target
on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on for a single
on middle and leg stump, worked away with the angle to fine leg
Gone! arm ball, on leg stump, Taylor comes down the wicket and flicks it away in the air, Khushdil a deep midwicket running in, slides and takes it on the 2nd attempt
on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side for a single
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
full ball, just outside off and angling across, goes for the drive and gets beaten
full ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
good length ball, on target, gets well forward and defends to off side
Shot! Slightly short in length, pulls it away to deep square leg fence for four
good length ball, tries to play a big shot and gets beaten
full ball, on off stump, pushes to wide of mid-off for a quick single
Good length ball, on middle stump and moves away a bit, Ervine tries to defends on the backfoot, gets a thick outside edge, Fakhar at point dives forward and takes a lovely low catch
Superb shot to gets off the mark! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, clipped away off his tos and raced away to deep midwicket fence for four
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side
on middle and leg stump, turned away to leg side for a single
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to gully, runs a quick single
short ball, on target, Chibhabha ducks underneath it
good length ball, on off stump, pushed to cover
full ball, lofted drive well short of long-on fielder
good length ball, on target, defended to off side
short in length, outside off, cuts to deep point
on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, lofted drive and just clear the long-on fielder and fence for a six
arm ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
once again tossed up, came down the wicket, mishit and long-on fielder running in, dives forward but still short of ball and cost four runs
short in length, outside off, cuts to off side
wrong one, hits the pad and missing leg stump, shout for lbw, turned down by umpire
Gone! Short in length on leg stump, got some turn, Chibhabha tried to pull, got the top edge and Haider at long leg took a good catch
tossed up, on leg stump, off the pad to leg side
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
sharp turn for Usman, pitches on off stump and spins away, beaten all ends up
googly this time, almost goes through the gate, inside edge onto pad
tossed up, on leg stump, turned to midwicket
Tossed up, on leg stump, went for the reverse sweep, got the top edge and Fakhar at gully took a simple catch
arm ball, on off stump, edges to off side
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to point
on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket, wants a single and sent back
short in length on leg stump, turned to deep square leg
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep square leg
tossed up, outside off, tried to drive, edged to gully for a single
Superb googly, goes through the gate, missed the stumps and keeper for four byes
another googly, hits the pad and missing leg stump
tossed up, on off stump, tried to sweep, hit the pad and shout for lbw, turned down by umpire, Usman asked for the review and replay shows that it was missing off
short in length, outside off, cuts to off side
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side for a single
arm ball, on off stump, tried to cut, edged it just short of short third man fielder
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
arm ball, on leg stump, went for the sweep and got the top edge and went all the way over fine leg fence for a six
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to long-on for a single
What a superb delivery, foxed the young Shumba with his googly, pitched on off stump and turned away, beaten all ends up and Rizwan did the rest behind the stumps
tossed up, outside off and spun away, tried to defend and beaten
tossed up, on off stump, defended on the front foot
on leg stump, swept away to fine leg for a single
Another cracking delivery, nicely tossed up, just outside off and spun away, Madhevere tried to defend, got the outside edge and Babar at slip took a simple catch
low full toss on off stump, driven to long-off
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, tries to defend and gets beaten, shout for caught behind, turned down, Babar asked for the review and replay shows no edge, decision stands
good length ball, on off stump, pushed to cover
full ball, on off stump, drives to extra cover, Imad misfielded cost couple of runs
again full ball, on off stump, drives to short cover
short in length just outside off, tries to defend and beaten
again tossed up, outside off, driven and inner edge to short fine leg for a single
Gone! Tossed up, on leg stump, went for the sweep, got the inner edge and Rizwan took a good catch down the leg side
short in length, comes down the wicket and slices it over gully for four
again back of length, cuts it away and times it weill, third man fielder chased hard but in vain
good bouncer on target, Tiripano ducks underneath it
short in length on off stump, stands tall and angles it to gully for a quick single
good length ball, on off stump, inside edge onto pad and runs a quick single
short in length, on leg stump, turned to midwicket for a single
short in length, outside off, cuts to point for a single
short in length, on off stump, defended back to bowler
Back of length, goes back and forces it up and over mid-off fielder for four and brings up 100 for Zimbabwe
another good shot, full on middle and leg stump, Masakada flicks it away to backward square leg fence for four more
short in length, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
short in length, outside off, angles it down to third man, slight fumble by Musa and Tiripano comes back for the 2nd run
slower ball, just outside off, tries to play a cut and misses it through to keeper
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off and runs a quick single, fielder at mid-off fails to hit the stumps
short ball, well over batsman head and called a wide
full ball, on off stump, defended back to bowler
short in length, outside off, angles it to gully for a quick single, fielder misses the stumps at bowling end and cost one for the throw
full ball, just outside off, goes for the drive, edges it down to third man and misfielded by Hasnain cost four runs
yorker on target, tries to defend, inner edge down to long leg for couple of runs
Full ball, on middle stump, tries to play a big shot, gets a thick outside edge and Imad at third man takes a good catch
full ball, on middle stump, whips it to midwicket for a single

full ball, on middle and leg stump, comes down the wicket to play a big shot, inner edge down to fine leg, coming back for the 2nd run, Imad picks up the fires in the hands of Fakhar who whips off the bails, Tiripano was well short
full ball, on off stump, pushed to off side
full ball, yorker length, tries to defend, inner edge races away down to fine leg fence for four
back of length, comes down the wicket to play a big shot and misses it
full ball, on off stump, pushes to point for a single
on middle and leg stump, driven to long-on
back of length, just outside off, goes for the pull and misses it through to keeper
slower ball, on leg stump, flicks the pad and goes to leg side for a legbye
full ball, just outside off, backing away, tries to play a big shot and misses it through to keeper
another good yorker, misses the bat and off stump on the way through to keeper
short in length, goes back and pulls to mid-on
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off for a quick single, fielder picks up and under arm throw missed the stumps
short in length, just outside off and moves away, Abdullah plays and misses
short in length, outside off, angles it down to third man and gets off the mark in T20I
on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a quick single
Full ball, on middle and leg stump, Abdullah flicks it away to wide of short fine leg fielder and goes for four
full ball, on middle and leg stump, flicks away down to fine leg for couple of runs
full ball, on off stump, gets well forward and defends it back to bowler
on leg stump, nips back into the left hander, tries to play on the leg side, hits the pad bit high and also going down the leg side, shout for lbw, turned down
full ball, on middle and leg stump, defended back to bowler
again full ball, on middle stump, gets right behind it and defends back to bowler
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
short in length, on leg stump, turned to leg side for a single
back of length, on middle and leg stump, defended back to bowler
Shot! Short and wide outside off, Fakhar stands tall and punches it away to backward point fence for four
Dropped! Good length ball, on off stump and angling across the left hander, Fakhar edges it and skipper at slip puts it down
on middle and leg stump, pushes to wide of mid-on for a single
fuller in length, on off stump, gets right behind it and defends to mid-on
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off for a quick single
again full ball, on middle stump, defends with the straight bat to cover
good length ball, just outside off and seaming away, tries to play at it and gets beaten
fuller in length, angling well down the leg side for a wide
good yorker, swings in late, tries to drive, thick inside edge to deep square leg
full ball, on leg stump, flicks away to short fine leg
full ball, on off stump, pushes to cover for a single
full ball, on off stump, driven to mid-off for a quick single, direct hit from fielder by Fakhar was well in
good length just outside off, drives on the up, thick outside edge over gully for couple of runs
full on middle and leg stump, flicked away to deep midwicket
Bang! Full ball, Fakhar dances down the track and hits it up and over long-on fence for a six
short and well wide outside off, left alone, called a wide
on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on for a quick single
full and angling down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
on middle and leg stump, flicks away to wide of short fine leg fielder for couple of runs
Full ball, outside off, drives hard straight to cover fielder
full ball, outside off, driven to deep cover for a single
slower ball, just outside off, comes down the wicket to play a big shot beaten all ends up
low full toss on off stump, driven straight to mid-off fielder
full ball, on middle and leg stump, driven to midwicket for a single
full ball, yorker length, digs out to midwicket
short in length, outside off, cuts to deep point
on leg stump, turned to wide of short fine leg fielder for a single
tossed up, on leg stump, pushed back to bolwer
tossed up, came down the wicket and tried to play inside out, inner edge and went to long-on
Gone! Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, came down the wicket and hit it straight in the hands of Madhevere at deep midwicket who took a simple catch, Fakhar fails again!
tossed up, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off and get off the mark with a single
short in length, pulls it to fine leg for couple
tossed up, on leg stump, pushed to long-on
on leg stump, turned away to leg side for a single
short in length, outside leg, went for the pull and took it on the pad
short in length, on leg stump, turned to short midwicket
arm ball, just outside off, angles it to short third man and good diving stop by Chigumbura
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
arm ball, on leg stump, pushed back to bowler
Bang! Tossed up, came down the wicket and driven up and over long-off fielder and fence for a six
arm ball, on middle and leg stump, flicked away to leg side for a single
Another big shot this time Haider. arm ball, on middle stump, hits it flat over long-on fence for a six
on middle and leg stump, turned to midiwkcet for a single
Another big shot and it was even bigger by Haider, on leg stump, heaved away over deep midwicket fence for a big six
faster ball, on leg stump, driven to long-on for a single
arm ball, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
on leg stump, swept away to short fine leg
tossed up, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
tossed up, on leg stump, driven to long-on for another single
short in length, on leg stump, pulls to deep midwicket
short in length, pulls to midwicket for couple of runs
on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
short in length, outside off, cuts and misses
another short ball, outside off, cuts and good stop by gully fielder
short in length, outside off, cuts away to deep cover
tossed up, well wide outside off and called a wide
arm ball, on target, pushed back to bowler
Shot! Tossed up, outside off, driven nicely and beat the sweeper cover fielder for four
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
Tossed up, outside off and spun away, tried to cut, edged it to keeper and Taylor took a sharp catch behind the stumps
tossed up, on leg stump, driven to long-on
on middle and leg stump, turned to short fine leg
short in length, outside off, cuts to point
short in length, outside off, cuts it away in the gap to deep point fence for four
Bang! Low full toss on leg stump, heaved away over deep midwicket fence for a six
Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, heaved away over deep midwicket fence for a six
on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
on middle and leg stump, pushed to long-on for a single
Shot! Short in length, outside off, cuts away to deep point fence for four
short in length, outside off, cuts to off side
Shot! Tossed up, came down the wicket and inside out drive over extra cover for four
tossed up, outside off, driven to deep cover
tossed up, on leg stump, swept away in the air just short of diving fielder
tossed up, well down the leg side, missed a sweep and called a wide
flipper pitched outside leg, hit the pad as Shah playing across the line, shout for lbw, turned down by Aleem Dar
Shot! Tossed up, on middle stump, hit it hard down the ground and even long-on fielder failed to cut it off
on middle and leg stump, heaved away to deep midwicket for a single
low full toss on off stump, pushes back to bowler
That's it! Shah finishes it off in style! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, Khushdil hit it flat over deep midwicket fence for a six
